meta.content: Georgia Connections Academy offers a alternative online homeschool experience for 5-12 students. Learn more about enrolling Georgia virtual school today.

div.p: Georgia Connections Academy is more than a fully accredited online school. It's a tight-knit school community offering all the services and resources needed to create a well-rounded student experience.

Ready to go? Start your online
registration now!

br.p: Students throughout Georgia are thriving at Georgia Connections Academy, a tuition-free online public school. Georgia Connections Academy gives students the flexibility to learn at home with a curriculum that meets rigorous state education standards.
